title: [Bugfix] Do not read Location of dynamic assemblies
body:
Fixes [AB#1761147](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/0bdbc590-a062-4c3f-b0f6-9383f67865ee/_workitems/edit/1761147)

### Context
`Assembly.Location` throws in fullFW (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.reflection.assembly.location?source=recommendations&view=net-7.0#exceptions)
It returns empty fron net5.0 up


### Changes Made
Altering the code to uniformly return empty path for dynamic assemblies (and prevent exceptions)

### Experimental Insertion Build
[Internal] https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/456834

commit.message: Do not read Location of dynamic assemblies

Merge pull request #8547 from JanKrivanek/exp/log-dynamic-assemblies

[Bugfix] Do not read Location of dynamic assemblies
